mapper.sql: id, crane_id, device_no, driver, device_time, status, weight, moment, height, range, moment_percentage, rotary_angle, tilt_angle, wind_speed, key1, key2, key3, key4, key5, key6, key7, key8, key9, key10, is_del, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user,

${alias}.id AS ${alias}_id, ${alias}.crane_id AS ${alias}_crane_id, ${alias}.device_no AS ${alias}_device_no, ${alias}.driver AS ${alias}_driver, ${alias}.device_time AS ${alias}_device_time, ${alias}.status AS ${alias}_status, ${alias}.weight AS ${alias}_weight, ${alias}.moment AS ${alias}_moment, ${alias}.height AS ${alias}_height, ${alias}.range AS ${alias}_range, ${alias}.moment_percentage AS ${alias}_moment_percentage, ${alias}.rotary_angle AS ${alias}_rotary_angle, ${alias}.tilt_angle AS ${alias}_tilt_angle, ${alias}.wind_speed AS ${alias}_wind_speed, ${alias}.key1 AS ${alias}_key1, ${alias}.key2 AS ${alias}_key2, ${alias}.key3 AS ${alias}_key3, ${alias}.key4 AS ${alias}_key4, ${alias}.key5 AS ${alias}_key5, ${alias}.key6 AS ${alias}_key6, ${alias}.key7 AS ${alias}_key7, ${alias}.key8 AS ${alias}_key8, ${alias}.key9 AS ${alias}_key9, ${alias}.key10 AS ${alias}_key10, ${alias}.is_del AS ${alias}_is_del, ${alias}.create_time AS ${alias}_create_time, ${alias}.create_user AS ${alias}_create_user, ${alias}.modify_time AS ${alias}_modify_time, ${alias}.modify_user AS ${alias}_modify_user,
mapper.select:
SELECT `${columnName}` as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName} where crane_id=#{id} and device_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) - interval #{total} minute GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
union all SELECT `${columnName}` as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName1} where crane_id=#{id} and device_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) - interval #{total} minute GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')

SELECT `${columnName}` as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName} where crane_id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(device_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
union all SELECT `${columnName}` as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time FROM ${tableName1} where crane_id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(device_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
